4.1.1. hardware package

4.1.1.1. Submodules

4.1.1.2. hardware.keithley2700_VISADriver module

class hardware.keithley2700_VISADriver.Keithley2700VISADriver(rsrc_name, pyvisa_backend='@ivi')[source]

Bases: object

VISA class driver for the Keithley 2700 Multimeter/Switch System

This class relies on pyvisa module to communicate with the instrument via VISA protocol Please refer to the instrument reference manual available at: https://download.tek.com/manual/2700-900-01K_Feb_2016.pdf

4.1.1. Parameters

modestring

Measurement configuration (‘VDC’, ‘VAC’, ‘IDC’, ‘IAC’, ‘R2W’, ‘R4W’, ‘FREQ’ and ‘TEMP’ modes are supported)

kwargsdict

Used to pass optional arguments - Autorange “RANG:AUTO <b>” <b> = ON/OFF - Range “:RANG: <n>” - Display resolution “:DIG <n>” <n> = 3.5, 4.5, 5.5 or 6.5 - Number of power line cycles “:NPLC <n>”
